name: Bluetooth.referringDevice
description: The Bluetooth.referringDevice attribute of the Bluetooth interface returnsÂ a BluetoothDevice if the current document was opened in response to an instruction sent by this device and null otherwise.
content:
Secure context
This feature is available only in secure contexts (HTTPS), in some or all supporting browsers.

This is an experimental technology
Check the Browser compatibility table carefully before using this in production.

The Bluetooth.referringDevice attribute of the Bluetooth interface returnsa BluetoothDevice if the current document was opened in response to an instruction sent by this device and null otherwise.
